headline: Why Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor machinery manufacturer Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) jumped 3.7% in the morning session after the broader semiconductor sector rallied as Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) announced a significant partnership with OpenAI to supply chips for artificial intelligence infrastructure.
